dict.string:
on alfred_script(q) tell application "Finder" activate open home #opening airdrop in a new window tell application "System Events" keystroke "r" using {command down, shift down} end tell end tell end alfred_script
--applescript source: https://github.com/gnuget/Alfred-Extensions/blob/master/open_airdrop/info.plist
Open Airdrop in a new Finder window
